snippet: Nadal, who had long ignored accusations of cheating, said he would sue a former French minister of health and sport after she claimed his long absences from the court were “due to a positive test.”...
lead_paragraph: Nadal, who had long ignored accusations of cheating, said he would sue a former French minister of health and sport after she claimed his long absences from the court were “due to a positive test.”

headline.print_headline: Rafael Nadal Threatens Lawsuit Over Renewed Doping Allegations
headline.main: Rafael Nadal Threatens Lawsuit Over Renewed Doping Allegations
